article_title: Planning helps employees find work-life balance
article_text:
Photo: Getty

You’d have fewer problems balancing your personal life with your career if you just did some planning.

That is what a recent study published in the Journal of Occupational and Organizational Psychology finds.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Jack Craver
article_metadata.description: Stress about work can be eased if you follow this simple rule: Plan.
